doc.title: Meet the Baltringues
doc.plot: It's a Saturday, the most important day of the week for all those singles out there who are searching for true love. The girls, Méli, Fati, Bégot, Sophia and her seventeen year old daughter Eva, and the boys, Pascal, Ben, Alex and Boum, are busy getting ready for the days outing. Through sheer chance and force of circumstance, the two groups meet, take leave of one another only to find themselves reunited in a night club. The group starts pairing off, most notably Boum and Eva, who soon leave the club. When the rest of the group leaves in search of the missing couple they discover that there has been a fatal car accident which has left Eva dead.The lives of the others goes on with it's highs and lows as before.
